snippet: Conflict over governing the University of Virginia has become a proxy war in a much larger struggle over control of the nation’s public universities.
abstract: Conflict over governing the University of Virginia has become a proxy war in much larger struggle over control of nation’s public universities, amid fears about their future; trustees and politicians in several states have increasingly flexed muscles to influence university operations, leading to turf battles with presidents and chancellors.
lead_paragraph: Conflict over governing the University of Virginia has become a proxy war in a much larger struggle over control of the nation’s public universities.

headline.seo: University of Virginia Crisis Reflects Wider Fight
headline.main: University of Virginia’s Crisis Reflects Wider Conflict
